product_name: SRAM MRX Comp Set Twist Shifter - 7 Speed
long_description: Serious shifting performance for recreational riders! MRX Comp(TM) provides crisp, positive response on your shifts. Features a 7-speed rear shifter and micro front shifter. Compatible with Shimano rear derailleurs.
short_description: Serious shifting performance for recreational riders! MRX Comp(TM) provides crisp, positive response on your shifts.
